nodes.text: The Implant armor Mod V was a model of implant armor made by the Tagge Company and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The armor cost 7500.
The Implant armor Mod V was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
